resources.string: Just Lyrics is a site that aims to provide a very important service. The retrieval of lyrics!
To often we find our selves sing along to our favourite songs, but when the music cuts out...
This application is for karaoke enthusiasts, for those who strive to understand the deeper meaning of songs, or just for people who can\'t understand a word of whats being said.
simply search an artist or album and begin your journey!
